column4: can anyone help me with usb drive not showing up and mounting?
is it showing up when you type lsusb?
what's the output of dmesg when you connect it?
not sure - too much of a noob
in your terminal type - sudo apt-get install pastebinit
it worked this am before i mounted my internal had drive and now it does not come up
That will install the paste bin utility then when it is installed type -  dmesg | tail | pastebinit
that will give you a link then paste the link in here and I'll be able to see the info of your dmesg output
have you disconnected and reconnected your external drive then run the dmesg command?
in the terminal go to cd /media/ and tell me what's listed in there
cdrom  cdrom0  floppy  floppy0 - but i olny have 1 dvd-rw no floppy
is this an internal or external HDD?
unplug the hard drive and do dmesg | pastebinit then after that plug it in and do dmesg | pastebinit again
